attributes.action: Eradicate all ghost hunting groups and impose restrictions on any paranormal activities
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to take a stand on all paranormal activities. The world is being deceived and manipulated causing unfair distress on society.No regulations are imposed on ghost hunting event organisers and incomplete information is being given causing dangerous consequences.
The government needs to take a look at why criminal behaviour is on the increase and why many crimes often use the reference of supernatural forces as the reasoning behind them.Evil is so apparent in our world today and we need to take away the influences not embrace them.
